summary: This is a service request form from the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) for technical support to install a new NICE VISION system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The request involves changing IP addresses on encoders and is marked as a priority.

persons.name: Anil
persons.context: An individual who is being helped with changing IP addresses on encoders as part of the NICE VISION system installation at the MCC New York.

events.title: Service request for NICE VISION system installation
events.description: A service request is created to bring the NICE VISION system onto the BOPNET at the MCC New York, involving changing IP addresses on encoders.

locations: FBOP MCC New York MS0109 (130164.001), NEW YORK, NY 10007
FBOP MCC New York MS0109 (130104.001), NEW YORK, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a service request form related to technical installation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The request is for installing a new NICE VISION system onto the BOPNET, marked as a priority.
The work involves changing IP addresses on encoders, with an individual named Anil receiving assistance.
The request was created on September 20, 2019, and indicates the problem is consistent and affecting all users.
